title: Mango Salad
short_description: This refreshing mango salad is a light and healthy dish that can be prepared in less than 15 minutes.It's a perfect side dish to complement any meal.

steps.title: Prep the Ingredients
steps.description: In a large bowl, combine the cubed mangoes, sliced red bell pepper, sliced red onion, and chopped cilantro.

steps.title: Make the Dressing
steps.description: In a separate small bowl, whisk together the lime juice, honey, salt, and black pepper until well combined.

steps.title: Combine and Toss
steps.description: Pour the dressing over the mango mixture and gently toss until everything is evenly coated.

steps.title: Serve and Enjoy
steps.description: Transfer the mango salad to a serving dish and serve immediately. Enjoy this delightful and light mango salad!
